#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int digitsum(unsigned long long int i)
{
	unsigned long long int j,k,l;
	j=i;
	while(j)
	{
		i+=(j%10);
		j/=10;
	}
	return i;
}
int main()
{
	unsigned long long int n,i,j,k;
	scanf("%llu",&n);
	bool flag=false;
	while(n--)
	{
		scanf("%llu",&i);
		j=i;
		k=0;
		flag=false;
		while(j>10)
		{
			k++;
			j/=10;
		}
		k*=9;
		for(j=15;j<i;j++)
		{
			if(digitsum(j)==i)
			{
				cout<<j<<endl;
				flag=true;
				break;
			}

		}
		if(!flag)
		{
			cout<<"NONE\n";
		}
	}
	
}
